body: Koharu is back but not the Koharu he wants. The sweet life he was fighting for won't happen. He realised there is no way back and chose to jump down the valley

It's still a decent ending for them albeit not the wholesome one, at least it's not the worst case where koharu is unsavable and he can only see her get bone by other guys. I just find it leaving a bad taste to my mouth how he tries to sell nagi it made me glad he didn't get the best ending bc he doesn't deserve it
They ruined it at the end. I fucking despise wholesome hentai.
Thats dope
what a bitter sweet ending .
I approve, no questions asked. - Ex hentai researcher
I kinda stopped midway and like kinda was weirded out by it but still fapped, because at the end of the day, it is a hentai so you can't expect much.

Honestly, I think the story was too rushed. When you have 150+ pages to work with, make good use of them. It also bothers me how he decided to sell Nagi, and the last colored page doesn't fit the story. And no, this isn't wholesome. In the end both Kaito and Koharu lost something important. Koharu lost her soul and virginity, while Kaito lost the sweet girl that he fell in love with. Nagi had the potential to be happy too, but she was unceremoniously sacked. There's not a single good thing about the ending, only sadness and two people coping. A happy after story could save these two, but there is none.

well u may hv financial independence but trudging in the tard for too long will have its effects...Ironic that the pro doll maker forgot its primary aspect and developed a self inflicted dissonance like his subjects
She clearly wanted to stay with him (he knew it too since he appologized). This is a hentai, and harem stories are not rare in hentai, so why not have both girls dammit?
In page 125 he said he is gonna sell Nagi. FUCKING IDIOT, WHY WOULD HE DO THAT.

1. Glad Kaito is actually hot for once because that makes schlicking even easier
2. Sweet ending for him and Koharu but this Oniichan stuff was kinda out of place just slapped onto the end.
..didn’t expect a somewhat good ending.

And please, it does looked like natorare in the beginning, but that only applies if our protagonist did lose his pairing in the end. But here, our protagonist didn't lose his. But keep in mind that this kind of stories tend to get exaggerated. After all, fandom happens a lot, so just use your imaginations if you wanted a good ending suitable for you, folks.

The story is good, yes, only good. As for nagi, it is her wish to become a doll.  There are no hint of love to our protagonist from nagi all she wanted is the happiness of a doll trained by him. And the same to our protagonist, who cares, but no love being harbored towards nagi.

It is unfortunate for our OTP considering koharu didn't manage to keep her promise and still end up being a doll. And from the rules, the trainers can claim their virginity is quite harsh over the plot is quite unacceptable(which is basically unlogical, yeah). But heroine turned doll are basically the main focus here instead of romance, in which I kind of expected what would happen in the end.
(i do wish for our protagonist is the one who turned her into a doll though...)

Well, our MC is the best trainer, that is for sure considering his ability compared to the other faceless mob trainers, just think about how long it has been after koharu trained? *smirk*
also this was great although i wish the trainer had his own harem... also nagi... he should've atleast kept her
